DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two analgesic methods performed preoperatively to assist positioning patients for performance of spinal anesthesia, namely fascia iliaca blockade and intravenous fentanyl.
DOC.brief_title: Analgesia for Positioning Hip Fracture Patients for Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Hip fracture contraindications for central nervous blockade impaired cognition or dementia multiple fractures any previous analgesic administration during the last 12 hours
